trans-unit.source: Create a new StorSimple Manager service
trans-unit.target: Create a new StorSimple Manager service

trans-unit.source: Describes how to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Describes how to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: To create a new service
trans-unit.target: To create a new service

trans-unit.source: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Management Portal at this URL: [http://azure.microsoft.com/](http://azure.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: Using your Microsoft account credentials, log on to the Management Portal at this URL: [http://azure.microsoft.com/](http://azure.microsoft.com/).

trans-unit.source: In the Management Portal, click **New** > **Data Services** > **StorSimple Manager** > **Quick Create**.
trans-unit.target: In the Management Portal, click **New** > **Data Services** > **StorSimple Manager** > **Quick Create**.

trans-unit.source: In the form that is displayed, do the following:
trans-unit.target: In the form that is displayed, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Supply a unique **Name** for your service.
trans-unit.target: Supply a unique **Name** for your service.

trans-unit.source: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.
trans-unit.target: This is a friendly name that can be used to identify the service.

trans-unit.source: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.
trans-unit.target: The name can have between 2 and 50 characters that can be letters, numbers, and hyphens.

trans-unit.source: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.
trans-unit.target: The name must start and end with a letter or a number.

trans-unit.source: Supply a **Location** for your service.
trans-unit.target: Supply a **Location** for your service.

trans-unit.source: In general, choose a Location closest to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.
trans-unit.target: In general, choose a Location closest to the geographical region where you want to deploy your device.

trans-unit.source: You may also want to factor in the following:
trans-unit.target: You may also want to factor in the following:

trans-unit.source: If you have existing workloads in Azure that you also intend to deploy with your StorSimple device, you should use that datacenter.
trans-unit.target: If you have existing workloads in Azure that you also intend to deploy with your StorSimple device, you should use that datacenter.

trans-unit.source: Your StorSimple Manager service and Azure storage can be in two separate locations.
trans-unit.target: Your StorSimple Manager service and Azure storage can be in two separate locations.

trans-unit.source: In such a case, you are required to create the StorSimple Manager and Azure storage account separately.
trans-unit.target: In such a case, you are required to create the StorSimple Manager and Azure storage account separately.

trans-unit.source: To create an Azure storage account, go to the Azure Storage service in the Management Portal and follow the steps in [Create an Azure Storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account).
trans-unit.target: To create an Azure storage account, go to the Azure Storage service in the Management Portal and follow the steps in [Create an Azure Storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account).

trans-unit.source: After you create this account, add it to the StorSimple Manager service by following the steps in [Configure a new storage account for the service](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service).
trans-unit.target: After you create this account, add it to the StorSimple Manager service by following the steps in [Configure a new storage account for the service](storsimple-deployment-walkthrough.md#configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service).

trans-unit.source: Choose a **Subscription** from the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Choose a **Subscription** from the drop-down list.

trans-unit.source: The subscription is linked to your billing account.
trans-unit.target: The subscription is linked to your billing account.

trans-unit.source: This field is not present if you have only one subscription.
trans-unit.target: This field is not present if you have only one subscription.

trans-unit.source: Select **Create a new storage account** to automatically create a storage account with the service.
trans-unit.target: Select **Create a new storage account** to automatically create a storage account with the service.

trans-unit.source: This storage account will have a special name such as "storsimplebwv8c6dcnf."
trans-unit.target: This storage account will have a special name such as "storsimplebwv8c6dcnf."

trans-unit.source: If you need your data in a different location, uncheck this box.
trans-unit.target: If you need your data in a different location, uncheck this box.

trans-unit.source: Click **Create StorSimple Manager** to create the service.
trans-unit.target: Click **Create StorSimple Manager** to create the service.

trans-unit.source: create a service
trans-unit.target: create a service

trans-unit.source: You will be directed to the **Service** landing page.
trans-unit.target: You will be directed to the **Service** landing page.

trans-unit.source: The service creation will take a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: The service creation will take a few minutes.

trans-unit.source: After the service is successfully created, you will be notified appropriately and the status of the service will change to **Active**.
trans-unit.target: After the service is successfully created, you will be notified appropriately and the status of the service will change to **Active**.

trans-unit.source: service creation
trans-unit.target: service creation
